attributes.action: Stop treating immigrants better than you treat english people
attributes.additional_details: There is shortage of housing but immigrants get priority, house those whos families were born here first, there are shortage of jobs but you keep letting immigrants in, send them home. Stop giving benefits to immigrants who have never worked here or send their money home. Its quite simple really THOSE OF US WHO WORK HARD AND PAY TAXES HAVE HAD ENOUGH OF PAYING FOR IMMIGRANTS TO GET BENEFITS, AND TAKE OUR HOMES AND JOBS WE WANT IT TO STOP.
